knimeNode.name: Meta Info Inserter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Inserts key, values pairs as meta information to documents.

fullDescription.intro: Inserts key, values pairs as meta information to documents. The keys and values must be provided as columns of the input data table. For each document in the rows of the input table, the values of the specified key and value columns are inserted as meta information. The column containing the documents, as well as the keys and values to insert must be specified.
fullDescription.option: The column containing the keys to insert.
The column containing the values to insert.
If checked, specified key and value columns are kept, otherwise they will be filtered.

ports.inPort: The input table which contains the documents.
ports.outPort: The output table which contains documents with the meta info inserted.
